column3: Before: After: ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull
Several people like the previous behaviour though... This also changes the "Copy transaction ID" - to copy the txid only (from txid-voutnr).\n
Concept ACK. I expect the people who rely on the old behaviour to be much fewer than those that get confused by it.\n

> This also changes the "Copy transaction ID" 

That's most of the point of this change. People paste that into block explorers and such, which don't know the format. Do you know of anyone (tools, applications and such) that adopted the txid-vout format besides us?

I mean theoretically I agree with you, the records represent a _output_ not a _transaction_, and very strictly doing this is wron
I do not know anyone using it. And anyone using it can workaround it easily. Thus I already ACKed above.\n

utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7761/commits/7d5e31a82bbf39b9e1a5f0afe5ad9cbf4df9778b

A txid + output # would be more properly called an "Outpoint ID" anyway.
